name: Social metadata is provided where appropriate
description:
Open a representative page in [Facebook's crawler](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/) and ensure it looks reasonable.
Check that [Twitter Cards meta data](https://dev.twitter.com/cards/overview) is present (for example `<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />`) if you feel it would be appropriate.
solution: Mark up content with [Open Graph](http://ogp.me/) tags and as advised by Twitter.
